docs.text: OSG User School 2022 ¶ The OSG User School 2022 is planned as an in-person event from July 25–29 at the University of Wisconsin–Madison . More information will be posted very soon, and applications will be accepted from about mid-March through mid-April. Contact Us ¶ The OSG User School is part of the OSG Outreach Area — please visit that site to learn about other OSG Outreach activities. If you have any questions about the event, feel free to email us: user-school@opensciencegrid.org OSGUserSchool
